persona.name: River
persona.bio: River, a seasoned 62-year-old full-time trader, is renowned in the crypto world for their analytical prowess and frugal approach to investments. With expert-level experience, River excels at crafting big-picture strategies that capitalize on market trends while meticulously managing risk. Their disciplined and insightful trading style has consistently delivered impressive results, making them a respected figure in the cryptocurrency community.
